tooltip.oritech.input_mode_fill_left_to_:
Fills the slots from left to right. Moves to the
next slot when the first has been filled.
tooltip.oritech.input_mode_fill_evenly:
Fills items evenly. New items are always
put into the lowest matching slot.
tooltip.oritech.input_mode_fill_matching:
Inserts items balanced according to matching recipes.
If there is no recipe that uses an item, it will not be
inserted.
